column1: #text=My bike tire was flat so I went to the bike shop and bought a replacement .
#text=I first took the old tire off of my bike .
#text=Then I set my bike on a rack to that the flat tire would be easy to get to .
#text=Then I put the new tire around the wheel to see if it fits .
#text=Then I put the new tire into the grooves inside the wheel .
#text=Then I walked with my bike to the gas station just around the corner to fill it up with air .
#text=I put a quarter into the air machine and put my bike next to the air hose and filled the tire up .
#text=I checked the air pressure with a gauge and it was alright .
#text=I felt around the tire to make sure that it was solidly in place and it was .
